nodes.description: Salman Abedi于2017年5月22日在曼彻斯特体育馆自杀式爆炸，造成22人死亡、116人受伤
nodes.support_text: which killed himself and 22 concertgoers on 22 May and injured 116 more

nodes.description: 调查初期认为存在恐怖网络关联，但后续证实Abedi主要单独行动
nodes.support_text: Police said they were investigating a potential terror 'network'. But now detectives say the 22-year-old shopped alone for most of the components

nodes.description: Abedi在袭击前四天（5月18日）返回英国，四天前曾访问利比亚
nodes.support_text: He is believed to have visited Libya just four days before the attack, arriving back in the UK on 18 May

nodes.description: 利比亚当局拘留Abedi的父亲和弟弟Hashem
nodes.support_text: His father and younger brother, Hashem, have been taken into custody by Libyan authorities

nodes.description: 英国警方逮捕16人，其中3人（包括Abedi的两位表亲）于5月24日被释放
nodes.support_text: Three men were released without charge on Tuesday: two men aged 20 and 24 from the Fallowfield area...

nodes.description: 警方通过手机记录、CCTV和数字设备分析Abedi的行踪
nodes.support_text: Police have examined Abedi’s phone records, along with CCTV footage, to begin to piece together his movements

nodes.description: 在Pilsworth垃圾场搜索Abedi使用的蓝色行李箱
nodes.support_text: officers have been searching a landfill site in Pilsworth, Bury, reportedly looking for the case

nodes.description: 11人（多为青少年）仍在拘留中，警方计划延长部分嫌疑人关押时间
nodes.support_text: Eleven men remain in custody, mostly in their late teens or early twenties

nodes.description: 发布Abedi在Wilmslow Road携带行李箱的CCTV图像并呼吁公众提供线索
nodes.support_text: police released a CCTV image showing Abedi wheeling a large blue suitcase and appealed for anyone who may have seen him with it

nodes.description: Salman Abedi使用组件制造炸弹
nodes.support_text: which killed himself and 22 concertgoers on 22 May and injured 116 more
which killed himself and 22 concertgoers on 22 May and injured 116 more

nodes.description: 被捕的青少年和妇女被释放
nodes.support_text: 被捕的青少年和妇女被释放

nodes.description: 持续返回威尔姆斯劳路区域
nodes.support_text: 他持续返回威尔姆斯劳路区域

nodes.description: 使用该行李箱进行相关行程
nodes.support_text: 他使用该行李箱进行相关行程
